body.p: Blandville, Kentucky, deputy constable. Kentucky native. Married to Caroline Emily Richardson. Father of Mary Richardson, Louisa Richardson, William H. Richardson, Margaret Richardson, Asa S. Richardson, Sarah Richardson, Rubin F. S. Richardson, Virginia A. Richardson, Emily P. Richardson, and Charles P. Richardson. Owned one enslaved person in 1850 and two in 1860. Deputy constable of Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1860.
